name: Cyberpunk Runner
description:
Cyberpunk Runner is a Endless runner for PC and Android.

______________________________________________________

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

Left Arrow: turn left.

Right Arrow: turn right.

Space: Jump.

F: Shoot.

______________________________________________________

In the dowload folder you will receive both the PC and the APK versions of the game.

1) Download the folder.

2) Extract the content in your PC.

3) If you desire to play on PC just double Click on the Cyberpunk Runner File.

4) If you desire to play on your Android phone, connect your phone to the pc and download the apk file in the download folder of your phone, from there disconnect the phone from the PC, go to the phone download folder, open the APK file and install the game, once the game is installed open it and make sure to unchek and check again the Mobile toggle to enable the joystick.

Have fun!
